analysis.key_quote: I believe the reclassification of the career civil service employees who participate in the development of funding announcements and oversee the review of grant applications as Schedule F would politicize the NIH, reduce public trust in federally-funded science, and reduce our ability to identify future cures for diseases that impact all Americans and to keep the US a leader on biomedical research - public and private.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concerns about the potential politicization of the NIH and its impact on scientific integrity, indicating opposition to the proposed rule.
